prompt: A highly detailed, professional photograph of a confident young professional male in his late 20s, with short styled black hair. He is wearing a crisp white shirt with sleeves neatly rolled to the forearms and dark trousers. He is working intently on a modern, minimalist laptop, with a focused expression and a slight, confident smile. The setting is a bright, modern co-working space with large windows allowing natural daylight to flood the scene. Minimalistic wooden furniture and a professional yet relaxed environment. Shot slightly from the side at desk level, capturing a candid productivity mood. Professional camera mode: Sony A7R V, FE 35mm f/1.4 GM, ISO 100, 1/160s, f/2.0, sharp focus on the face and screen, high dynamic range, clean post-processing. Unwanted: messy background, visible brand logos, other distracting people, harsh shadows.

A medium close-up shot of the young businessman's hands typing rapidly on the laptop keyboard, with a subtle depth of field blurring the background. His rolled white shirt sleeves are prominent. The natural light highlights the texture of his skin and the crispness of his shirt. Shot at desk level. Professional camera mode: Canon EOS R5, RF 85mm f/1.2L USM, ISO 200, 1/125s, f/1.8, focus on hands, shallow depth of field, warm color temperature. Unwanted: messy background, visible brand logos, other distracting people, harsh shadows.
